Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2013 05:43PM lawgirljenn wrote: I'm meeting with a radiation oncologist tomorrow afternoon.  My MO says I need rads, but I don't want to do it.  The side effects scare the hell out of me.  I had 3 positive nodes, but my surgeon took 16.  She says she got clean margins and in her words, "got all the cancer out."  I just finished 8 courses of dose dense chemo.  4 a/c and 4 Taxol.  I wish I knew what to do.
